outline:
1. to wait, hope, expect
    1. (Niphal) to wait
    2. (Piel)
      1. to wait, await, tarry
      2. to wait for, hope for
    3. (Hiphil) to wait, tarry, wait for, hope for
kjv_def: (cause to, have, make to) hope, be pained, stay, tarry, trust, wait.
strongs_def: to wait; by implication, to be patient, hope
